fp: Hey! I don't know how else to start my intro so I'll just repeat my name one more time. My name is Helios and I am a web developer. I studied psychology in York University and graduated with a BA Hons. degree. My perspective has shifted since then and I find I am more qualified to be a web/software developer than a therapist. Now I am looking to get my foot in the door in the IT industry. Plus it definitely pays more!
sp: Besides web dev, I like to play PC games, cook, swim, and dance.
